desc: The Nine Driving Forces at AKUA LIFE: 1-Love 2-Quality 3-Potency 4-Results 5-Helping People 6- Health Wellness 7-Being Eco-Friendly 8-Happy Customers 9-Making Money ~ When we bring the first 8, the 9th is the natural result ~ ~ Our goal is to bring you the absolute very best the word has to offer ~
